name: Onwards to the Deep Space
description:
In the beginning, the mist was an insignificant speck in the vast universe.

Then it spaned a planet, next a planetary system, soon whole galaxies...

Disegreting any organic matter it came into contact with.

It was only a matter of time before it would reach us.

So we turned our hopes to the deep space and left our world to the machines.

Hopefully, they will remember their creators fondly and perhaps aid us in our quest.

I've been taught the universe to be infinite; I trust it is true...

...we need it to be.
